name: Oh Christmas Tree Long-Sleeved Tee
description:
We are offering a classic and favorite design on a long-sleeved Monag t-shirt. It has been hand-screened in white. This design is perfect for Christmas and beyond!  This tee is 6.5 oz 100% ring spun combed cotton, super soft, fine interlock, spandex rib set in collar, double needle hem sleeve & bottom.

The sizing is a little different from this manufacturer so be sure to read the sizing options below before ordering! I find these shirts to be true to size, but if in doubt order up.

This shirt is available in the following sizes:
2
4
6
8
10

All items ship USPS First Class {2-5 day delivery}. Shipping for 1 item is $5.00, each additional item is $1.50. Don't forget a "priority mail upgrade" is available for $3 on shop main page if you need them quick!!!

This tee is a fine baby rib (100% cotton) construction, but fits more narrow through body and sleeve than the Monag & Comfort Colors tees. I suggest ORDERING UP on these tees because they run narrow through body.

name: Off to the Bay Children's Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
Our long-standing favorite design is now available on a grey hooded sweatshirt for chilly days & nights.

This sweatshirt that is pre-shrunk with set-in sleeves, open bottom, cover seamed waist hem, 2x1 rib knit cuffs and pouch pocket perfect for rocks, acorns, pine cones and any other suitable treasures. 

Because this garment is pigment dyed, the t-shirt manufacturer suggests that you wash with like colors on a cold water cycle. The nature of a pigment dyed garments is for the color to wear in with time, allowing some of color to fade, and have the appearance of your long-time favorite sweatshirt.

Available in children's sizes:

XS: 2/4
SM: 6/8
MED: 10/12
LRG: 12+

::Shipping::
All items ship USPS First Class {2-5 day delivery}. Shipping for 1 item is $6.00, each additional item is $2.00. Don't forget a "priority mail upgrade" is available for $3 on shop main page if you need them quick!!!

Because this garment is pigment dyed, the t-shirt manufacturer suggests that you wash with like colors on a cold water cycle. The nature of a pigment dyed garments is for the color to wear in with time, allowing some of color to fade, and have the appearance of your long-time favorite sweatshirt. name: Bird Dog Children's Hooded Sweatshirt
description: Consider yourself warned... your child may never want to take this off! A simple bird dog adorns a super soft, "burnt orange", pigment dyed hooded sweatshirt that is pre-shrunk with set-in sleeves, open bottom, cover seamed waist hem, 2x1 rib knit cuffs and pouch pocket perfect for rocks, acorns, pine cones and any other suitable treasures. Because this garment is pigment dyed, the t-shirt manufacturer suggests that you wash with like colors on a cold water cycle. The nature of a pigment dyed garments is for the color to wear in with time, allowing some of color to fade, and have the appearance of your long-time favorite sweatshirt. The screen print design will naturally grab some of the pigment from the sweatshirt and take on a slightly orange tone, this too is the nature of pigment dyed garments! Available in children's sizes: XS: 2/4 SM: 6/8 MED: 10/12 My best assessment of size is that these sweatshirts run completely true to size. name: Bookplate Stickers
description:

Our square design measures 3" x 3" and is printed with a deep blue ink. Our rectangular design measures 3.5" x 2" and is printed in green ink.

Sold in sets of 10, or 2 sets of 5 {5 of each design}.
